attributes.action: Create safe and secure parking for HGV's going about their lawful business.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HGV Drivers can spend long periods of time away from home. We need proper facilites at strategic points with health, safety and security in mind. A tired driver is a dangerous criver. Layby's are not suitable, there are no facilities, such as a shower or toilet nor is there any were to get anything to eat. These are not just nice things to have, they are basic necessities.
